summary: This mod adds 25% magic resistance to the Cushioned perk and 25% power attack bonus to Fists of Steel perk
descriptionHtml:
----- BY REQUEST: HEAVY ARMOR BUFF V 1.0-----

Feb. 26, 2012

====================
Description
====================
This mod adds some extra abilities to two heavy armor perks: Fist of Steel and Cushioned.

- Fists of Steel now adds 20% power attack damage (standing & forward)
- Cushioned now adds 25% magic resistance (when wearing full heavy armor set)


====================
Installation
====================
Extract the Data folder into your skyrim installation path. Make sure you don\'t turn off your
computer while the file is copying.


====================
Uninstallation
====================
Delete the file heavy_armor_buff.esp from Skyrim\\Data folder. Make sure you don\'t spill coffee on
your computer while the file is deleting.


====================
Miscellaneous
====================
This mod is provided \"as is\". By using this mod you agree to not hold me responsible
should your computer(s) a) explode, b) implode, c) develope sapience and kill you in your sleep.

Heavy armor buff should not conflict with existing mods unless they modify the following:
- Fists of Steel Perk
- Cushioned Perk
- Contain a magical effect entry with ID \"PerkCushionResistance\"


====================
Contact Info
====================
